translation.en: If Mom calls, tell her I'm in the shower.
translation.zh: 我十点前回来.如果妈打来,说我在洗澡.

translation.en: You were gonna help me with my science presentation.
translation.zh: 你原本今晚要帮我做我的科学演说.

translation.en: There's two dummies on the couch. Practice on one of them.
translation.zh: 沙发上有两个笨蛋.用他们来练习.

translation.en: Ouch.
Tyler!
SAM: All right, there we go.
Okay. And...
Sergeant, your orders are to guard this porch.
translation.zh: 长官,你被命令... ...要守护这个门廊.

translation.en: It was more than a hundred years ago
when Nikola Tesla first lit up the sky over Wardenclyffe, New York.
translation.zh: 当尼古拉特斯拉首次点亮纽约沃登克里弗的天空时.

translation.en: Tesla wanted to create a world where anything could be transmitted through giant electric towers:
translation.zh: 特斯拉想创造一个以巨大电塔来传送一切的世界.

translation.en: Power, sound, maybe even brain waves.
translation.zh: 电源,音响,甚至脑电波也是.

translation.en: It was like the original Wi-Fi.
translation.zh: 它就像原始的无线上网.

translation.en: But suddenly and mysteriously, he shut down his lab in 1908.
translation.zh: 但突然又神秘地,他在1908年把研究所关了.

translation.en: His tower never lit up the sky again.
translation.zh: 他的塔从此不再照亮天际.

translation.en: Until... today!
May I have a volunteer?
You, sir, in the gray suit.
translation.zh: 你,先生,穿着灰色西装那个.

translation.en: Hold this and prepare to be amazed.
translation.zh: 拿着,然后预备看惊奇的事.

translation.en: I present to you all:
Tesla!
Don't give me that look. I'm trying to bring back your tower.
translation.zh: 别给我那脸色.我在尝试还原你的塔.

translation.en: SLAPPY: Bravo.
I, for one, think it's an electrifying presentation.
translation.zh: 对我来说,这是激动人心的介绍.

translation.en: Sam. I'm not gonna fall for that again.
translation.zh: 萨姆.我不会再被你骗了.

translation.en: Ha-ha-ha. Very funny.
It's like a microphone? You're talking through your cell phone or something?
translation.zh: 是麦克风吗?你用电话或什么的说话?

translation.en: Sam. Sam, it's a stupid prank.
translation.zh: 萨姆.萨姆,这是个愚蠢的玩笑.

translation.en: You ever heard of personal space? Mm!
How are you talking to me right now?
You brought me to life. Don't you remember, Sonny?
translation.zh: 你让我活过来了.记得吗,索尼?

translation.en: Sam? SAM: What?
What's the problem?
Just come up here. Please.
Dude, I told you, I don't care about Tesla.
translation.zh: 老兄,我告诉过你.我对特斯拉没兴趣.

translation.en: Right now, Sam. SAM: Fine!
I've always wanted a brother.
Please don't try to educate me on Tesla.
translation.zh: 我一直想要一个哥哥. 请别尝试教我特斯拉的事.

translation.en: Hello, Sam. Thank you for saving me from that moron today.
translation.zh: 哈罗,萨姆. 今天谢谢你把我从那笨蛋手中救出来.

translation.en: Oh, he's battery-operated.
[WHISPERING] No, no, no. Sam, Sam, he's alive.
SLAPPY: Sorry for what happened with Tommy.
translation.zh: 我对汤米的事感到抱歉.

translation.en: I guess you could say he got hosed.
translation.zh: 我想你可以说他被痛打了一顿.

translation.en: That was you? SLAPPY: Yep.
And now that we're family, we can be brothers!
translation.zh: 现在我们是家人了... 我们可以成为兄弟!

translation.en: I think I'd make a great Junk Brother.
translation.zh: 我觉得我可以做个很棒的垃圾哥哥.

translation.en: Right. Just a sec. Sidebar.
Are we losing our minds?
I don't think we can at the same time.
translation.zh: 我不认为我们俩可同时疯了.

translation.en: Okay, but just to clarify, we're talking to a puppet right now.
translation.zh: 好,但我想确认,现在我们和一个玩偶说话.

translation.en: Yeah.
Maybe he's alive.
Of course I'm alive! Heh-heh-heh.
And I can make all your problems go away.
translation.zh: 而且我能够让你一切烦恼消失.

translation.en: Didn't your sister tell you to fold the laundry?
translation.zh: 你姐姐不是叫你折衣服吗?

translation.en: There. Now you have time to do your homework.
translation.zh: 看.现在你有时间做功课了.

translation.en: Oh, what's that? You don't want to do your homework?
translation.zh: 那是什么?你不想做功课?

translation.en: That's okay. I just did it for you.
You know algebra?
A squared plus B squared equals of course! Heh, heh.
This is amazing. It's all correct.
So you can change all of our grades.
translation.zh: 那你可以换了我们所有的成绩!

translation.en: I can only change the things right in front of me.
translation.zh: 我只能改变在我眼前的事.

translation.en: But whatever I see, I can bring to life.
translation.zh: 但无论我看到什么,都能给它生命.

translation.en: ANNOUNCER: Round one. Fight!
SONNY: That is awesome.
I will never question picking up junk again.
Wait until Mom and Sarah find out.
SLAPPY: Slow your roll there, kid.
Let's just keep this our little secret for now.
translation.zh: 现在我们先守着这秘密.

translation.en: Give me a chance to win them over first.
translation.zh: 给我一个机会来讨他们的欢心.

translation.en: SLAPPY: Ah, you're terrible at this. Heh-heh-heh.
I'm literally crushing you right now.
Can't believe you're losing to a puppet.
translation.zh: 没想到你要输给一个玩偶.

translation.en: Right. And I'm not even using my magical powers.
translation.zh: 对吧?而且我都没用我的法术.

translation.en: Back so soon?
Don't ask. SONNY: Are you okay?
What happened? What happened?
Well, turns out the guy I liked is a total scumbag.
translation.zh: 原来我喜欢的男人是个混蛋.

translation.en: Mom expects me to run this entire house by myself.
translation.zh: 妈妈要我独自一人管理整个家.

translation.en: And if I don't figure out this essay by Friday,
translation.zh: 如果我在周五前无法把文章写完...

translation.en: I'm never getting out of this town. So no, I'm not okay.
translation.zh: 我永远无法离开这镇.所以,我不是很好.

translation.en: Why are you guys acting so weird?
Us? Nothing.
SAM: No reason at all. Mm-hm. I'm working on my science project.
translation.zh: -没什么理由. -我在做我的科学课业.

translation.en: We're just playing video games. Just us two.
Nobody else. SONNY: Mm-hm.
I'm going to bed.
Good night.
Who just said that?
Me! Sam.
[IN RASPY VOICE] Good night. SONNY: It's a new thing we're doing.
[IN RASPY VOICE] Good night. Good night.
Hit the hay. SONNY: Good night, Sarah.
Night-night.
[NORMALLY] That is not cool, Slappy.
What the hell?
Ugh. God, they are such tools. TYLER: Boo!
translation.zh: 我的天,他们真笨. 嘘!

translation.en: Missed you at the show last night.
Bet you did. You have fun?
It was okay. A bunch of us just hanging out.
translation.zh: 还不错.我们只是在闲聊.

translation.en: Totally casual.
Right.
What's with the dummy? Oh, him?
We were just hanging out.
Totally casual.
Fly, little ghost.
Hey, whoever that is, can you toss me up some more string?
translation.zh: 无论你是谁,能不能丢多点线给我?

translation.en: SLAPPY: Sure.
Okay.
That's hilarious.
Sarah?
Oh! Hey, hey, hey, not funny, not funny.
Sarah, stop fooling around.
I'd say you're the one fooling around.
How are you talking?
I love the theater.
I always bring down the house.
Wait, no! What are you doing? What are you doing?
Tell me, Tyler. What does it say on that top step?
translation.zh: 告诉我,泰勒.梯子最后一阶写着什么?

translation.en: Uh... It's not a step?
translation.zh: 不是梯级 不是梯级?

translation.en: Maybe you'll remember that
the next time you step out of line with my sister.
translation.zh: ...下一次你再对我姐姐过分的时候.

translation.en: It was a puppet, man. It was a puppet.
It had these supernatural powers.
He could move things with his mind.
I swear.
She knows! Ask her. It was in her locker.
translation.zh: 她知道!问她.它就在她的储物柜!

translation.en: Please tell him real quick. Sarah, tell him!
translation.zh: 拜托,快告诉他们. 莎拉,告诉他们!

translation.en: It's just the meds kicking in, sir.
translation.zh: 那只是药物发挥效用了,先生.

translation.en: Last guy said he saw a dragon.
translation.zh: 上一个病人说他看见龙.

translation.en: It wasn't a dragon. It was a puppet.
Nikola Tesla constructed this tower right here in Wardenclyffe, New York
translation.zh: 尼古拉特斯拉在纽约沃登克里弗造了这座塔...

translation.en: to beam bolts of electricity across the world.
And today...
we are going to beam bolts of electricity across this classroom.
translation.zh: 我们会在这课室发射电力.

translation.en: Someone beam me out of this classroom.
translation.zh: 请把我从这课室发射出去吧.

translation.en: May I have a volunteer?
You, ma'am, in the pink sweater.
translation.zh: 你,小姐,穿粉红毛衣那位.

translation.en: Hold that and prepare to be amazed.
translation.zh: 握着它然后预备看让你惊奇的事.

translation.en: Behold:
The power of Tesla.
Mr. Quinn, unplug that now!
translation.zh: 奎因先生,马上拔下电源插头!

translation.en: BOY: That was awesome!
And that was my presentation on Nikola Tesla.
translation.zh: 那就是我对尼古拉特斯拉的演示.

translation.en: Any...? Any questions?
Today's picture day!
This is not good. I'm so busted.
Oh, great, the fire department's here?
They're definitely gonna make you repeat a grade.
Please tell me you guys had nothing to do with this.
translation.zh: 请告诉我这和你们无关.

translation.en: Sonny blew up the science wing. It was so cool.
translation.zh: 索尼刚把科学室炸了.好酷!

translation.en: It was an accident.
What are you doing here?
Tyler Mitchell just got loaded into an ambulance.
translation.zh: 泰勒米治刚上了救护车.

translation.en: He said the dummy you guys put in my backpack
translation.zh: 他说今早你们放进我背包的玩偶...

translation.en: attacked him with supernatural powers.
We didn't put Slappy in your backpack.
translation.zh: 我们没把斯拉皮放进你背包.

translation.en: Get in.
SARAH: You're telling me
that you discovered a walking, talking dummy and you didn't tell me?
translation.zh: 你们发现一个会走,会说话的玩偶而没告诉我?

translation.en: He seemed like a nice guy at the start.
translation.zh: 一开始他看起来是个好人.

translation.en: He had great manners. He told us to keep it a secret.
A, I'm your sister.
And B, as a general rule, when an animated doll tells you to keep secrets, that's a red flag.
translation.zh: 第二,一般上,一个玩偶要你保守秘密时,就是警报.

translation.en: He's not just some doll. He's got powers. He can move stuff with his mind.
translation.zh: 他不是什么玩偶.他有能力,可以用念力移动东西.

translation.en: You guys, this is insane.
I mean, why would he go after Tyler?
translation.zh: 我是说,他为何要对付泰勒?

translation.en: Maybe he heard you complaining about him last night.
translation.zh: 也许昨晚他听见你对他的投诉.

translation.en: Great. What else did I complain about?
Mom.
Hey, kids, you wanna see the mummies come to life?
translation.zh: 孩子们,想不想看木乃伊复活?

translation.en: Sorry, Mr. Chu! Don't have time to talk now!
translation.zh: -抱歉,朱先生! -现在没时间说话!

translation.en: Your loss!
Mom! Ms. Quinn!
Hey. You didn't tell me you got a ventriloquist dummy. How fun!
translation.zh: 你没告诉我你有个口技假人.真有趣!

translation.en: He was sitting at the table like a little person.
translation.zh: 他就像个小矮人一样坐在桌上.

translation.en: "Hi, kids. My name is Bobo. And I like listening to Mom." Heh, heh.
translation.zh: "嗨,孩子们.我叫波波.我喜欢听妈妈的话."

translation.en: Mom, his name is Slappy, and I would not do that if I were you.
translation.zh: 妈,他叫斯拉皮,我是你就不会那样做.

translation.en: Slappy. That's a ridiculous name.
No, no. His name is Bobo.
Mom, you don't understand. Ms. Quinn, he's alive.
translation.zh: -妈,你不明白. -奎因小姐,他是活的.

translation.en: I think these guys are trying to play some sort of a Halloween prank on us,
translation.zh: 我觉得他们在跟我们开万圣节玩笑...

translation.en: but I'm not buying it. Are you? No.
Oh, let me get that. But nice try. Very creative.
translation.zh: 让我来接. 但做得好.很有创意.

translation.en: Stay right there. Don't go anywhere.
Hi, kids. Good day at school?
translation.zh: 嗨,孩子们.今天上学还好吗?

translation.en: Oh, my God. He sounds even creepier than he looks.
translation.zh: 天啊.他的声音比外表更恐怖.

translation.en: Ha-ha-ha. We're gonna be such a happy family.
translation.zh: 天啊.他的声音比外表更恐怖. 我们会成为一个幸福的家庭.

translation.en: You're not our family.
Do it, Sonny. Turn him off.
Hearing you say that makes me mad.
translation.zh: 听你这样说令我很生气.

translation.en: Don't do that.
Do it again.
It worked.
And trust me.
You don't want to find out what happens...
when I get mad.
KATHY: Okay. Hm?
Well, that was an interesting phone call.
Anything you wanna tell me?
translation.zh: 你们有什么要告诉我的吗?

translation.en: Yes, we've been trying to. That dummy is evil.
translation.zh: 是,我们想说了.这玩偶是邪恶的.

translation.en: You blew up the science lab?
Yeah, there was that too.
Do you know how much damage you've caused?
translation.zh: 知不知道你破坏的要多少钱?

translation.en: It wasn't Sonny's fault. KATHY: I'm sure it was an accident.
translation.zh: -妈,不是索尼的错. -我肯定是个意外.

translation.en: It wasn't an accident. The dummy did it. Yeah.
Do I look like a dummy to you?
translation.zh: 我看起来像个容易上当的人吗?

translation.en: We're telling the truth!
Here's some truth for you. Halloween is canceled for the three of you.
translation.zh: 好,我有真话给你们.你们三人今晚的万圣节庆典取消.

translation.en: What? Canceled.
Come on. KATHY: You know...
translation.zh: 别这样. 我对男孩们这种疯狂已在预料之中.

translation.en: I expect this kind of craziness from the boys.
translation.zh: 我对男孩们这种疯狂已在预料之中.

translation.en: But I felt like you were gonna help me keep things under control, Sarah.
translation.zh: 但我真的以为你会帮我看管他们,莎拉.

translation.en: Mom. I'm disappointed.
Come on. Mom. Mom, please.
Not as disappointed as I am.
My room. Now.
We've got a problem.
Yeah. I have never seen your mom that mad.
translation.zh: 是.我从没见过你妈那么生气.

translation.en: I'm talking about the psycho dummy on our couch.
translation.zh: 我是说沙发上的变态玩偶.

translation.en: Did somebody call a family meeting without me?
translation.zh: 有人没叫我加入家庭会议吗?

translation.en: No, no. Slappy, why would you think that?
translation.zh: 不!斯拉皮,为何那样想呢?

translation.en: We were just planning a surprise party for you.
translation.zh: 我们只想帮你计划一个惊喜派对.

translation.en: Well, I've got a surprise for the three of you.
translation.zh: 我也有惊喜给你们三人.

translation.en: This is my house now.
And under my roof,
I make the rules.
Sorry, but you just got voted out of this family. Huh? Aah! SAM: Oh!
translation.zh: 抱歉,但你刚被踢出这个家庭了.

translation.en: What do we do with him now?
translation.zh: 现在我们该拿他怎么办?

translation.en: Fireplace.
No. No way. I would have nightmares the rest of my life.
translation.zh: 不.不行.我一生都会发恶梦.

translation.en: No. I have a better idea.
SONNY: Ugh. We've been walking forever.
It's like this whole place is made of poison ivy.
translation.zh: 看来整个地方都是毒藤.

translation.en: SAM: Stop complaining.
How much farther is it?
Here. This should work.
Am I the only one that feels like we're committing a crime?
translation.zh: 现在只有我觉得我们在犯罪吗?

translation.en: It's a dummy. The only crime we're committing is littering.
translation.zh: 是个玩偶.我们唯一犯的罪是乱丢垃圾.

translation.en: Ready? Yeah, yeah.
Okay, watch out.
It's done.
Let's get out of here.
SAM: Sonny, come on.
We just killed a puppet.
Trust me, we had to.
And I say we just forget it ever happened, because no one will believe us anyway.
translation.zh: 我们最好忘了它,反正没人会相信我们.

translation.en: It's over.
He's locked in a suitcase.
There's no way that dummy's getting out.
Who you calling "dummy," dummy?
What do you want from us?
I just want to be part of the family.
translation.zh: 我只想成为这家庭的一分子.

translation.en: SONNY: He's gonna break through the windshield.
Is everyone okay? SAM: Yeah. Think so.
Where's Slappy?
Guys, I think we just made things a thousand times worse.
translation.zh: 各位,我想我们把事情搞得更糟.

translation.en: ♪ Trying to find Some sign of life ♪
translation.zh: -那间屋子,那边. -等等,那个? -是. -是.

translation.en: ♪ One is a guy That is kind of creepy ♪
♪ It's a little stickling Said sleepy ♪
KIDS: Trick or treat!
CHU: There you go, Hank.
All right, come on in. Zoink!
Step right up. Don't be scared.
Welcome to my haunted house.
All right. Here you go. Happy Halloween.
Hey, what's up, my witches?
Little Frankenstein humor.
Beat it.
Here you go.
Bye-bye!
Hey, my princess.
Bye-bye!
Hey, my cowboy.
BOY: I'm not a cowboy! CHU: Yes, you are. Bye-bye!
"A mysterious disturbance recently took place "in the town of Madison, Delaware.
translation.zh: "最近特拉华州麦迪逊镇发生一场神秘的骚乱.

translation.en: "Neighborhoods were ravaged and the high school destroyed.
translation.zh: 社区遭到破坏,高中被摧毁.

translation.en: "An FBI spokesman said unusual weather patterns were to blame,
translation.zh: 联邦调查局发言人表示,应归咎于不寻常的天气...

translation.en: "but there were rumors of a cover-up "for something far stranger.
translation.zh: 但有传闻说是为了掩饰一些异常的事.

translation.en: "Sightings of giant insects, Abominable Snowmen, and even...
translation.zh: 发现巨虫踪迹,恶心的雪人,甚至...

translation.en: ...an evil ventriloquist dummy."
Oh, we're so dead.
"Creatures believed to come alive from the original manuscripts of horror author R.L. Stine."
translation.zh: "相信是从恐怖作家斯汀的手稿中复活的生物."

translation.en: The book. What book?
In that abandoned house, we found this old locked-up book.
translation.zh: 好,我们在那废屋找到一本老旧及被上锁的书.

translation.en: And when we unlocked it, that's when Slappy appeared.
translation.zh: 我们解锁后,斯拉皮就出现了.

translation.en: Yeah, but Tommy Madigan took it from us.
Well, how do you know the book was written by R.L. Stine?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道那本书是斯汀写的?

translation.en: Wait a second.
"legendary horror author R.L. Stine lived in Wardenclyffe, New York."
translation.zh: 知名作家斯汀住在沃登克里弗,纽约."

translation.en: SARAH: Here? That's not good.
"Stine started his writing career "with a since-unpublished novel titled Haunted Halloween,
translation.zh: "斯汀从未发表小说闹鬼万圣节开始写作生涯...

translation.en: "a tale of a demonic dummy who sets out to create a family of his own by..."
translation.zh: 是一个邪恶假人的故事,他为了造自己的家,以..."

translation.en: By--? By what?
By bringing Halloween to life.
translation.zh: 以让万圣节复活来创造.

translation.en: I love a good holiday sale.
Hello, old friends.
If those kids don't want me to be a part of their family,
translation.zh: 如果那些孩子不要我成为家人...

translation.en: I'll raise one of my own.
Okay.
Yes.
SLAPPY: Trick or treat.
Welcome to the family,
Walter.
Serving families is what I do. Heh, heh.
translation.zh: 我的工作就是服务家庭.

translation.en: Heh, heh. Come along, then, brother.
Just wait until you see what I have planned next for this town.
translation.zh: 你等着看我接下来给这小镇的计划吧.

translation.en: Guys, this is bad.
This is really, really bad.
You know what we need to do? We need to call the police.
translation.zh: 知不知道我们该做什么?报警.

translation.en: And tell them what? That an evil dummy is about to bring Halloween to life?
translation.zh: 然后说什么?一个邪恶的假人要让万圣节复活?

translation.en: Yes! SARAH: Great idea, Sam. They'll come and arrest us.
translation.zh: -是的. -好主意,萨姆.他们会来逮捕我们.

translation.en: Wait, guys, I found a number. For Stine?
translation.zh: -等等,我找到一个号码. -斯汀的?

translation.en: No, says here nobody knows where he is, but this is for Richard Shivers.
translation.zh: 不,这里说没人知道他在哪里,但这是李察西华的.

translation.en: He's the president of the R.L. Stine Appreciation Society.
translation.zh: 他是斯汀书迷会的会长.

translation.en: What are you doing? I'm calling.
RECORDING: Good day, you've reached Dr. Richard Shivers and the R.L. Stine Appreciation Society.
translation.zh: 你好,你接通了李察西华博士及斯汀书迷会.

translation.en: If you're trying to reach Stine, don't bother. Otherwise, leave a message.
translation.zh: 如果你想找斯汀,别想了.不然,请留言.

translation.en: SARAH: Hi, Mr. Shivers, my name is Sarah Quinn. I live in Wardenclyffe, New York.
translation.zh: 西华先生,我是莎拉奎因,来自沃登克里弗,纽约.

translation.en: I desperately need to get in touch with R.L. Stine.
This is gonna sound crazy, but I think one of his stories has come to life.
translation.zh: 听起来很扯,但看来他其中一个故事成真了.

translation.en: Hi, Mr. Shivers...
Well...
Looks like we're on our own.
Wait, where are we going? To find Tommy Madigan and get that book.
translation.zh: -等等,去哪里? -找汤米拿回那本书.

translation.en: Get that one.
No way he's gonna be able to get that.
translation.zh: -老兄,那个糟透了. -他不可能拿到那个.

translation.en: SONNY: Tommy! Tommy! SAM: Tommy! Hey.
Tommy! Tommy!
BOY: What do these idiots want? I'll take care of this.
SONNY: We need that book.
It's really important. It's super important.
The book with the lock on it. Okay, okay. What book?
The one you stole from us, Tommy.
translation.zh: 你从我们这里抢走那本,汤米.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. I've got it right here.
Oh, really? No, idiot.
translation.zh: -对.现在在我这边. -真的? 不,笨蛋.我为何在万圣节带着书到处走?

translation.en: Why would I be carrying a book around with me on Halloween?
translation.zh: 不,笨蛋.我为何在万圣节带着书到处走?

translation.en: Now, go back home with your babysitter. I'll be there in a bit to egg your house.
translation.zh: 和你的保姆回家吧.等一下我去你家丢蛋.

translation.en: Listen, you little punk, I'm not the babysitter. I'm Sonny's sister.
translation.zh: 听好,你这小流氓.我不是保姆,是索尼的姐姐...

translation.en: You're gonna give us that book back or I'll make your life a living hell.
translation.zh: 你必须把书还回来,不然我让你生不如死.

translation.en: The only thing you'll use that toilet paper for is to wipe--
translation.zh: 那厕纸的唯一用处是给你抹...

translation.en: Okay. God, you don't have to be so mean about it.
Let's get out of here.
Book's at my house in my room.
But it's hidden, so good luck finding it, losers. Heh, heh.
translation.zh: 但被藏起来了,自己找吧输家,祝你好运.

translation.en: Those are some awesome costumes.
Is this actually happening?
Guys, we gotta find that book!
translation.zh: 各位,我们必须赶快找到那书!

translation.en: SLAPPY: Evening, Mr. Tesla.
You don't mind if we bring your tower back to life, do you?
translation.zh: 你不介意我们让你的塔重生吧?

translation.en: [QUIETLY] What did he say?
Shut up.
SLAPPY: Tesla used this tower to project electricity,
translation.zh: 特斯拉用这座塔投射电力.

translation.en: but I'm going to use this tower to project my magic in ways he never imagined.
translation.zh: 我会以他无法想象的方法用这塔投射我的魔术.

translation.en: It takes a genius to know a genius.
Come along, Walter.
We've got work to do.
Very well. Let's go.
SONNY: This is Tommy's house.
Well, I guess we just knock?
SAM: Knock loud. He lives with his grandma.
Okay.
Wait! Guys, there she is.
SONNY: She's asleep.
I guess we'll just have to wake her up.
translation.zh: 看来我们只好把她叫醒.

translation.en: Hello! Come on. Hello!
Hello! Tommy's grandma!
[SIGHS] Wow. Guess she's a deep sleeper.
[SIGHS] It's locked.
Find another way in and go get that book.
translation.zh: 找另一个方法进去拿那本书.

translation.en: What are you gonna do?
I'm gonna make sure nothing surprises us. Go!
translation.zh: 我要确保情况在我们掌握当中.快去!

translation.en: What?
[WHISPERING] I can't believe we're breaking into someone's house right now.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信我们现在正闯入某人的家.

translation.en: [WHISPERING] Hey, they got gummy bears.
Who cares? Stop screwing around.
AUTOMATED VOICE: Hands off!
Sam, stop screwing around. Let's go. Okay, all right. [CLICKS]
SLAPPY: Watch this, Walter.
Why settle for a small family, Walter,
translation.zh: 为何满足于一个小家庭,华特...

translation.en: when we can project my power everywhere
translation.zh: 当我们可把我的法力到处投射...

translation.en: and bring all of Halloween to life?
translation.zh: 就能让万圣节完全复活!

translation.en: [LAUGHS] Yeah.
translation.zh: 就能让万圣节完全复活! 对.

translation.en: Sam, I found it. Yeah. You found it?
SONNY: "R.L. Stine."
How did we miss that?
That can't be good. Yeah. We gotta go.
Let's just go back out the window. SAM: All right.
Sam!
The hand has my hand!
Just rip it off! Throw it!
Sam. Turn around.
They're moving.
Sonny, they're just gummy bears. They're so tiny and cute. What can they do?
translation.zh: 索尼,它们只是小熊软糖.又小又可爱.它们会做什么?

translation.en: Hey there, little guys.
Sam, you just ate half their family. I would not do that if I were you.
translation.zh: 萨姆,你把它们半个家族吃了.我是你的就不那样做.

translation.en: Why are they walking towards us?
Okay. All right. Maybe they just want us to stay and play.
translation.zh: 好.也许它们只想我们留下来玩.

translation.en: God, where is everyone?
Oh, there's one on my back, Sam! Okay, okay!
Pull harder! I'm trying!
Go for the window, Sam!
I'm coming!
Just! Stop! Giggling!
Sam! I need some help over here...
[WAILING] Sonny!
Mom, we're under attack!
Sonny, what are you talking about? Where's Sarah? Who's attacking you?
translation.zh: 你说什么?莎拉呢?谁攻击你?

translation.en: Gummy bears.
KATHY: What? Honey, you're mumbling. Put Sarah on the phone.
translation.zh: 什么?亲爱的,你在喃喃自语.叫莎拉听电话.

translation.en: KATHY: Sonny. BEAR: Whee!
KATHY: What--?
Okay, that's it. Do not leave the house! I'm coming home.
translation.zh: 好,够了.不准出门!我回来着.

translation.en: Sonny, help!
Sam, I'm coming!
Hurry!
No, no, no! You'll never take me alive!
That is my new favorite book.
You okay? I think.
Let's get out of here.
What are you guys doing in there?
Oh, no big deal, really. Just being mauled by my favorite comfort food!
translation.zh: 小事.我刚被我最爱的食物攻击!

translation.en: Wait. Just stop. Stop, stop! What are you guys even talking about?
Everything is alive, Sarah. Even candy.
translation.zh: 一切都活过来了,莎拉.连糖果都是!

translation.en: Well, is that the book? Let's read it.
There's something you need to know about this book.
translation.zh: 你们必须知道有关这本书的事.

translation.en: What?
Look out!
That's what.
This is not a normal book, Sarah.
translation.zh: 这不是一本普通的书,莎拉.

translation.en: Who would write this?
Oh, what is this?
Okay.
Hyah! Oh, you rehearsed that, did you?
Best costume of the night, sir.
GIRL: Go!
There! Let's take the alley. It's empty.
translation.zh: 那边!我们用小巷吧.是空的.

translation.en: Wait, wait!
We need to read the book and see how we can end this. Let me see.
translation.zh: 我们必须读这书,看如何结束这一切.让我看.

translation.en: "It was nearly Halloween in the town of Wardenclyffe--" Blah, blah, blah. Here!
translation.zh: "沃登克里弗镇将迎来万圣节..."等等.这里!

translation.en: "His revenge was to create a family
translation.zh: "他的报复是让万圣节复活来创造一个家庭...

translation.en: by bringing Halloween to life, but that wasn't enough."
translation.zh: "他的报复是让万圣节复活来创造一个家庭... 但他觉得不够."

translation.en: That seems like plenty of revenge to me.
translation.zh: 为什么?对我来说已经报很大的仇了.

translation.en: "Because he wanted more than a family. He wanted a mother.
translation.zh: "因为他要的不只是一个家.他要一个妈妈.

translation.en: His plan was to..."
Was to what? Keep reading.
I-I-I can't.
That was the last page. It's an unfinished manuscript.
translation.zh: 那是最后一页. 这是一份未完成的手稿.

translation.en: What?
Okay, great. What do we do now?
translation.zh: 很好.现在我们该怎么办?

translation.en: Slappy's gonna go after Mom.
That book is the only thing we have to stop him.
translation.zh: 这书是唯一可制止他的东西.

translation.en: We have to go to the nursing home and save her.
translation.zh: 我们必须去养老院救她!

translation.en: Mom's not at the nursing home.
Where is she?
On her way home to save us. What?
translation.zh: 她正在回着家救我们. 什么?

translation.en: She called while we were attacked by gummy bears.
translation.zh: 我们被小熊软糖攻击时她打来.

translation.en: Why answer at a time like that?
translation.zh: 你为何在那时候接电话?

translation.en: Maybe because unlike you, Sarah, I pick up Mom's phone calls.
translation.zh: 也许因为我不像你,莎拉,我会接妈的电话.

translation.en: Really? Guilt trip much?
We need to find your mom before Slappy does.
translation.zh: 我们必须在斯拉皮找到你妈前找到她.

translation.en: Now, come on, let's go!
Your woodworking skills are impressive.
translation.zh: 您的木工技能令人惊叹.

translation.en: Yes.
This will do nicely.
Oh, I used to manage a hardware store.
Walter. Focus, please. Yes.
Now tell my monsters to get me Mama and get me that book.
translation.zh: 现在叫我的怪物把妈妈和那本书带回来.

translation.en: SARAH: Run! [PEOPLE CLAMORING]
SAM: Duck! [ALL SNARLING]
Look out!
What the--?
SONNY: That's Mr. Peters!
MAN 1: Nice doggy. MAN 2: It's right behind you!
MAN 1: Ah! Not on my leg!
That's Mom! That's Mom! Come on!
PIRATE: You bunch of scallywags!
KATHY: Kids, watch out!
Behind you!
Okay, now's our chance.
Give me the book. I'm gonna protect Mom.
translation.zh: 把书给我.我会保护妈妈.

translation.en: You get the ladder and meet me at that tree.
translation.zh: 你们去拿梯子在那棵树见面.

translation.en: Wait till it's safe, then go. Okay.
Okay, okay.
Oh, my God! We're all gonna die! Run for your life! Ah!
translation.zh: 天啊!我们全都会死!快逃!

translation.en: [CRYING] Oh, my God.
Oops. Not a monster.
SAM: All right, let's go!
Come on!
Halt!
My orders are to guard this porch!
No way.
You like carving pumpkins, huh? Look what you did to poor Terry.
translation.zh: 你喜欢南瓜雕刻?看你对可怜泰利所做的事.

translation.en: Hiya! I'm round.
Sergeant Squash, open fire.
We need to find another way in! No. This is my house.
translation.zh: -我们必须找另一个入口! -不.这是我的家.

translation.en: SERGEANT: I'm hit! Medic!
What are you doing? Put me down! Hiya! Happy Easter.
translation.zh: -你在干什么?放我下来! -嗨!复活节快乐!

translation.en: Yes! Let's go.
Sarah, I was so worried. Are you okay?
translation.zh: 莎拉,我很担心.你还好吗?

translation.en: I'm fine. Just hang tight.
I'm gonna get you down. I promise. I just need you to trust me.
translation.zh: 我会把你救下.我答应你.我只要你相信我.

translation.en: KATHY: Don't worry about me. Run. Hide!
Ghost at 11 o'clock!
No, no, no! Get back here!
SARAH: That's my book! Ah!
We gotta go.
Sarah! Sarah, let go of that ghost!
translation.zh: 莎拉! 莎拉,放开那只鬼!

translation.en: Do not let go of that ghost!
You okay? No, that ghost took the book.
translation.zh: -你没事吧? -不,那鬼抢了那本书.

translation.en: SONNY: Mom! Oh, kids. Help!
No, no, no!
Sarah! SARAH: Mom!
SONNY: It's heading for the Tesla lab.
Slappy brought the tower to life. That's why this is happening.
translation.zh: 斯拉皮让塔活过来.所以才发生这一切.

translation.en: We have to stop him.
Uh, guys?
Sonny, what do we do? I don't know. You're the older one.
translation.zh: -索尼,我们该怎么办? -我不知道.你最大.

translation.en: No, no, no. It's me, Mr. Chu!
Mr. Chu?
Shh! Follow me! To the basement now!
translation.zh: 跟我来!马上到地下室去!

translation.en: Don't ruin the Mylar. I'm saving it for next year. Go, go, go.
translation.zh: 别毁了聚酯薄膜.我留着明年用.快!

translation.en: Let me get this straight.
translation.zh: 沃登克里弗 55哩 让我搞清楚.

translation.en: We are living a Goosebumps story right now?
translation.zh: 现在我们活在鸡皮疙瘩故事里?

translation.en: Okay, clearly you're a fan.
This is the greatest thing I've ever heard!
Hold on. Let me guess, let me guess, let me guess. Um...
Monster Blood.
No, too on the nose. Yeah, you're right. Um...
translation.zh: 不,太明显了.是,你说得对.

translation.en: The Scarecrow Walks at Midnight.
No. Haunted Halloween.
I don't know that one. How does it end?
translation.zh: 我没见过那个.它的结局如何?

translation.en: That's the problem.
It doesn't.
Hello, Mama.
Remember me?
You put me on your lap.
Put those cute words in my mouth.
What was it you called me? "Bobo"? Ha-ha-ha.
Can't talk?
Don't you worry.
From now on, I'll do the talking for both of us.
translation.zh: 从现在开始,我会替我们两人说话.

translation.en: I'm gonna make you so proud, Mama.
translation.zh: 我会让你感到骄傲,妈妈.

translation.en: [LAUGHING] It's working.
Yes.
My mind is literally blown right now.
I mean, we get to finish our Goosebumps story!
translation.zh: 我是说,我们可完成把鸡皮疙瘩故事!

translation.en: This isn't a creative-writing exercise, Mr. Chu. Slappy has our mom!
translation.zh: 这不是创意写作练习,朱先生.我妈在斯拉皮手上!

translation.en: Yeah, and then you get to save your mom. It's Chapter 22:
translation.zh: 是,然后你就可以救你妈.是二十二章

translation.en: "The kids save their mom from the demonic dummy."
translation.zh: 孩子们把妈妈从邪恶假人手中救出!

translation.en: Well, the only thing I had to save my mom was that book, and I lost it. So...
translation.zh: 唯一可以救我妈的就是那本书,我失去了.所以...

translation.en: Sarah. This is not your fault.
translation.zh: 莎拉. 这不是你的错.

translation.en: If anything, it's my fault. I'm the one who found the book and brought Slappy to life.
translation.zh: 是我的错.是我发现书然后让斯拉皮复活.

translation.en: And I even told Slappy about Tesla.
translation.zh: 我还告诉斯拉皮有关特斯拉的事.

translation.en: Mom trusted me to take care of you guys, and I told her I would save her.
translation.zh: 妈妈信任我来照顾你们,我也答应会去救她.

translation.en: I failed.
I know I always say that I can't wait to go to college and get started on my real life,
translation.zh: 我知道我常说要上大学及开始我的人生,但...

translation.en: but you guys are my life.
translation.zh: 我知道我常说要上大学及开始我的人生,但... ...你们就是我的生命.

translation.en: This is a classic Goosebumps moment. Do you remember Say Cheese and Die--?
translation.zh: 各位,这是典型鸡皮疙瘩.记不记得微笑后去死...

translation.en: This is real life, Chu! Okay.
Guys, Slappy is using the Tesla Tower to power Halloween.
translation.zh: 各位,斯拉皮正使用特斯拉塔来激活万圣节.

translation.en: If I can get in there, maybe I can shut it off, and we can save Mom.
translation.zh: 如果我能够进去,也许可把它关了救妈.

translation.en: But there's monsters everywhere. How are we gonna get past them?
translation.zh: 是,但到处是怪物.我们要如何穿过它们?

translation.en: Easy.
Camouflage.
Welcome to my crafts lab.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到我的工艺实验室.

translation.en: Wow.
♪ Let me tell you now I don't know how ♪
Jeez, they're still everywhere.
translation.zh: 哎哟,它们还是到处都是.

translation.en: It's actually working.
Come on. We gotta get to that tower.
SONNY: I can't believe we're really here.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信我们真的在这里.

translation.en: I can barely see out of this thing. Is it cool? Is it awesome?
translation.zh: 从这东西看不大能看见啊.酷吗?很棒吧?

translation.en: [WHISPERING] Hey, fanboy. Let's focus.
Right. Sorry.
Let's go.
SARAH [SOFTLY]: Don't. Move.
Come on, let's go. Come on!
Look at this place.
SARAH: It's so creepy.
Stay close.
SAM: No wonder Tesla abandoned this place.
translation.zh: 难怪特斯拉遗弃这地方.

translation.en: Shh, shh, shh. Do you hear that?
Come on.
STINE: Oh, no.
Not Haunted Halloween.
Oh, my writing was so cliché back then.
I knew it! I knew I came up with that first.
translation.zh: 我就知道!就知道是我先想到的主意.

translation.en: That clever little dummy's writing his own ending.
translation.zh: 那聪明的小假人在编写自己的结局.

translation.en: Not in my book, he's not.
Oh, gnomes.
Don't you dare.
Stay.
Ow! Son of a-- Ah!
Oh, witches!
Get away, witches!
SAM: Guys, do you hear that? Shh!
Wow.
SARAH: Whoa.
Welcome.
Slappy.
Walter? [GRUNTS]
Where's my mother?
Don't you mean our mother?
[IN RASPY VOICE] There's my sweet little babies.
I just love a family reunion.
Mom. What did you do?
SLAPPY: I had a papa once!
He let me down.
But a mother's love is forever.
Turn her back now, you psycho!
translation.zh: 马上让她恢复,你这变态的!

translation.en: Oh, should I?
Unfortunately, I have other plans.
translation.zh: 可惜的是,我有其它计划.

translation.en: Walter! The book, please.
Yes.
This book.
Go prepare the tower!
I'm going to do what Stine couldn't:
Finish this book, once and for all.
[CHUCKLES] Spoiler alert:
The manuscript gets destroyed in that tower,
translation.zh: 手稿在那座塔里被摧毁了...

translation.en: and my Halloween family lasts forever!
translation.zh: 而我的万圣节家庭永远存在.

translation.en: Mama, babysit the children for me.
Yes, dear.
We can't let him destroy that book.
translation.zh: 我们不能让它毁了这本书.

translation.en: Sonny, turn this thing off. I'm going after Slappy.
translation.zh: 索尼,把这东西关掉.我去追斯拉皮.

translation.en: Just you and me now, Slappy.
translation.zh: 现在只剩你和我了,斯拉皮.

translation.en: Can't hear you. I'm too far ahead of you. Hee-hee-hee!
translation.zh: 听不到.我领先你太多了.

translation.en: SONNY: This is amperage and this is voltage?
None of these cables make any sense.
What about here? Start pulling levers.
translation.zh: 这里呢?开始拉杠就是了.

translation.en: No, no, Sam, don't! Ah!
Slappy booby-trapped all this stuff.
translation.zh: 斯拉皮都已经装了陷阱.

translation.en: Careful, Sarah. It'd be a shame to fall from that height.
translation.zh: 小心,莎拉.从这高处跌下很危险.

translation.en: Plenty more where that came from.
Come on, Sonny, turn this thing off.
translation.zh: 快点,索尼,把这东西关了.

translation.en: Oh, no. Sonny hurry up.
translation.zh: 糟了. 索尼,快点.斯拉皮在顶部.做些什么.

translation.en: Slappy's at the top. Do something.
translation.zh: 索尼,快点.斯拉皮在顶部.做些什么.

translation.en: I can't do it, Sam.
Come on, Sonny. You are the smartest kid I know.
translation.zh: 别这样,索尼.你是我所认识的人当中最聪明的.

translation.en: Sam, I couldn't even do my little science project. Slappy did that.
translation.zh: 萨姆.我连我的小科学计划都做不好.是斯拉皮做的.

translation.en: And even that one shorted out.
Wait. That's it.
We turn it up. All the way up. We blow the fuse.
translation.zh: 我们把它开到最强.炸了保险丝.

translation.en: Yes! The fuse is over there.
And now to finish this story and destroy the town.
translation.zh: 现在,写下故事结局然后毁了这镇.

translation.en: No!
What do you think you're doing?
Writing my own ending.
Spoiler alert: I save the town
translation.zh: 剧透:我救了这镇.把你放回你所属的地方.

translation.en: and put you back where you belong.
translation.zh: 剧透:我救了这镇.把你放回属于你的地方.

translation.en: SLAPPY: What's the matter?
Writer's block?
Again?
Grab that lever. Yes. This one?
On my count, we push up at the same time.
translation.zh: 是的.按照我的拍子,我们同一时间向上推.

translation.en: Ready? Go!
Give me the book.
You're not gonna get this book, Slappy.
translation.zh: 你别想拿到这本书,斯拉皮.

translation.en: I have a friend who might think otherwise.
translation.zh: 我有个朋友并不认为如此.

translation.en: Nowhere else to run, sis!
Fine. You win, Slappy.
I'll give you the book, but you gotta turn my mom back.
translation.zh: 我会把书给你,但你必须把妈妈还回来.

translation.en: Deal.
It all ends Slappily ever after.
You forgot one thing:
Never judge a book by its cover.
translation.zh: 永远别以封面来判断一本书.

translation.en: What?
No!
[NORMALLY] Sonny, what's happening?
Mom.
We need to get out of here!
It's working!
Go, kids!
Hello?
Someone called for me?
KATHY: Sarah? Oh! Oh... Mom!
STINE: Hello?
I got your message. I'm here.
translation.zh: 我收到你的讯息.我来了.

translation.en: Don't worry. Everything's going to be okay.
I need typing paper, a thesaurus,
translation.zh: 我需要稿纸... 一本词库,减肥可乐和一个安静的地方来写稿.

translation.en: Diet Coke, and a quiet place to compose.
translation.zh: 一本词库,减肥可乐和一个安静的地方来写稿.

translation.en: Preferably in a comfortable chair with lumbar support.
translation.zh: 最好有支撑腰部的舒适椅子.

translation.en: Are you R.L. Stine?
Me? No, I'm Dr. Seuss. R.L. Stine was unavailable.
translation.zh: 我?不,我是苏斯博士.斯汀不得空.

translation.en: Yes, of course, I'm R.L. Stine!
Then I guess this belongs to you.
Don't open it.
My first book.
You realize I wrote this when I was around your age.
translation.zh: 我写这本书时和你们的年龄差不多.

translation.en: More of an amateur work, really, but I am sure you'll all agree
translation.zh: 比较是业余工作,真的,但我相信你们都会同意...

translation.en: it shows the undeniable promise of a brilliant young writer.
translation.zh: 它展示了一位杰出年轻作家无可否认的承诺.

translation.en: Why do you have a typewriter?
I was going to save you with it,
although it appears you found a way to save yourselves.
translation.zh: 但看来你找到救自己的方法了.

translation.en: A typewriter? It's been done before.
Once before.
Maybe twice.
Maybe more.
WALTER: Kathy?
Walter, manager at Fred's Pharmacy. It's nice to see you.
translation.zh: 华特,弗雷德药房经理.很高兴认识你.

translation.en: Hi. It's nice to see you too. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 嗨.我也很高兴见到你.你为何在这?

translation.en: I don't know.
Walter! Walter! You got turned into a monster.
You were big, green, ugly. You were Slappy's henchman!
translation.zh: 你又大,绿色,又丑.你是斯拉皮的狗腿子!

translation.en: Weather patterns. Very strange weather patterns.
translation.zh: 变化多端的天气.很奇怪的天气变化.

translation.en: But I think everything's back to normal now.
translation.zh: 但我想现在一切都恢复原状了.

translation.en: Fine. Okay, yeah, the weather has been weird. It's true. Okay, thanks.
translation.zh: 好.天气的确是很奇怪.没错.好,谢谢.

translation.en: KATHY: What happened to your shirt?
translation.zh: 好.天气的确是很奇怪.没错.好,谢谢. -你的衣怎么了? -我不知道.

translation.en: WALTER: I don't know.
Go ahead, ollow-fay. SONNY: What? [IN ENGLISH] Means "follow." Pig Latin.
Oh, the youth today.
WALTER: So funny running into you.
Right? I always hoped we'd run into each other outside of work.
translation.zh: 对吧?我总希望我们在工作以外遇见.

translation.en: WALTER: Yeah, me too.
Hey, if you're not busy next week, would you wanna have some dinner?
translation.zh: 如果你下星期有空,要不要和我吃晚餐?

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, heh, heh. Yeah? That's awesome.
So they don't remember what happened to them?
translation.zh: 他们不记得发生在他们身上的事?

translation.en: The transmutation process seems to have wiped their memories clean.
translation.zh: 异变过程似乎抹去了他们的记忆.

translation.en: All those who were affected won't remember a thing.
translation.zh: 那些被影响人的不会记得任何东西.

translation.en: Tommy?
SAM: Are you okay? Oh, my God. Guys.
I had this crazy dream.
I'm so glad to see you.
You know, can't believe I'm saying this, but I'm glad to see you too, Tommy.
translation.zh: 不敢相信我会这么说,但我也很高兴见到你,汤米.

translation.en: Kids falling from the sky.
translation.zh: 从天上掉下来的孩子们.

translation.en: My work here is done.
translation.zh: 我在这里的工作已完成.

translation.en: I'm a writer too.
Well, an aspiring, very stuck writer at the moment.
translation.zh: 是一个有抱负,文思枯竭的作家.

translation.en: My condolences.
All the horrors in the world can't compare to the terrors of the blank page.
translation.zh: 世上所有恐怖都无法与空白页的恐怖相提并论.

translation.en: Um, any advice on college essays?
translation.zh: 你对大学入学论文有什么建议?

translation.en: Well, first rule of writing: write what you know.
translation.zh: 写作的第一条规则:写你所知的.

translation.en: Thirty years, and I couldn't figure out how this book should end.
translation.zh: 三十年后我还是不知道这本书的结局该如何.

translation.en: And somehow you figured out how to finish it in one night.
translation.zh: 但你却在一个晚上想出结局.

translation.en: I believe in you.
Hm. "Write what you know."
SARAH: Recount a time in your life when you faced a fear, challenge or failure.
translation.zh: 重温你生命中面对恐惧,挑战或失败的一段时间.

translation.en: I think most of us are afraid that we don't have a story to tell.
translation.zh: 我想大部分的人都害怕自己没有故事.

translation.en: That there's nothing special about us.
And then a moment comes when you least expect it where you have to step up,
translation.zh: 而当那一刻在没预料之下来到,你必须勇敢面对.

translation.en: no matter how terrified you are.
But what I've learned is that it's good to be scared sometimes.
translation.zh: 但我学习到,有时候恐惧是好的.

translation.en: Scared of losing the people we love.
translation.zh: 害怕失去我们所爱之人.

translation.en: Stop, stop! It's a ventriloquist dummy.
Oh. Really?
That's not funny, Mom. Too soon.
No, I like it.
Congratulations, Sonny.
translation.zh: 特斯拉科学展览 恭喜你,索尼.

translation.en: Thank you so much, Principal Harrison.
translation.zh: 非常谢谢你,哈里森校长.

translation.en: SARAH: Or scared of not achieving our dreams.
Because those moments remind us just how special our stories really are.
translation.zh: 因为那些时刻提醒我们,自己的故事有多特别.

translation.en: Here's to us. Indeed.
Hey, Sarah! Hi, Mr. Chu.
CHU: Watch this.
[CHUCKLES] I like it.
Yeah, I just made it life-size this year. You know, just in case.
translation.zh: 是啊,今年我把它做成实物一样大小.以防万一.

translation.en: No, seriously, you know, just in case.
Right. I'll see you later, Mr. Chu.
Bye!
SARAH: And maybe when you face enough of your fears
translation.zh: 也许当你面对自己的恐惧时...

translation.en: life stops being so scary after all.
Hey, honey.
What happened?
I got in. I knew it. I knew you could do it.
translation.zh: -我被录取了. -我就知道.我就知道你会成功.

translation.en: Oh, I'm so proud of you!
I guess I'm proud.
Thanks, Sonny. Come on, bring it in.
translation.zh: 谢谢你,索尼. 来,给个拥抱.

translation.en: Congratulations.
[CHUCKLES] Here, take off your jacket. Guys, give her some ornaments, please.
translation.zh: 把外套脱下吧.你们请给她一些装饰.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah.
I'm so happy! Ha-ha-ha!
Here, put that right there. Yeah, I like that one.
Finally, a new book.
Yes.
SLAPPY: Hello, Papa.
Slappy! I thought the book got you.
translation.zh: 斯拉皮!我以为你被收进书里了.

translation.en: Maybe those others, but not me.
translation.zh: 也许其它的有,但不是我.

translation.en: Why is that?
You know I always survive.
You wrote me that way.
In fact, I wrote my own story while I was gone.
translation.zh: 事实上,我离开那时就写了自己的故事.

translation.en: And guess what.
You're the main character.
No.
No!
You try living in a book for a while, Papa.
translation.zh: 你试试看在一本书里过一段日子.

translation.en: HAND: Hands off!
Hiya! Look at my candle.
SLAPPY: Slappy Halloween.
